trends: There has been one other sighting in Lynchburg, Moore County
There were no other sightings in Lynchburg, Moore County on or around October 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsTv stopped producing a picture. When out side for a smoke. As soon as I walked out facing west I looked to the North. That is when I first seen a large reflection in the sky. I watched it reflect several times and then when to grab my camera. I took several shots of the object than grab my spotting scope. where I could make out its shape. It was long with a straight bright line through the center, end to end. It was mostly fuzzy from the center line out. It had, at the two ends bright lights that were connected to the center line light. (blueish white) The whole object would become very bright at times, seemed random. the object slowly traveled out of my sight picture.
